component.text: Providing Internet services is a highly competitive business, and poor services can cause the ISP to lose customers to competing ISPs.
Having a good help desk ensures that problems are resolved quickly and to the customer’s satisfaction.
Whether a technician is employed inside the organization as a help desk technician, or as an on-site support technician, they represent the ISP to the customer.
Today, there are millions of individuals connected to this global network and the number is growing.

After completion of this chapter, you should be able to:
  • Describe the various roles of help desk and installation technicians.

  • Describe the seven layers of the OSI model and how the OSI model is used in troubleshooting network issues.

  • Identify common tools and diagnostic procedures of help desk technicians.

  • Describe on-site procedures to resolve issues.
